name: Blossom
description: This work was done in 2012, when I started meditating. My work of art has become more meaningful to me. The inner light of each one of us was present in almost every work I did after this one. When I decided use art to express the mistery of life, I found an abundant source of inspiration. And this is what keeps me in this path. It is good to know that it won't ever have an end.
